title.narrative: Protection support for human rights defenders at imminent risk

description.narrative: Protection of emergency protection and medium term protection support for human rights defenders at imminent risk in Uganda. Includes provision of tailored emergency protection interventions for HRDs at risk in Uganda; placement of exiled HRDs in the Kampala Hub City Program, Digital Security emergency help-desk for Uganda HRDs and organisations facing attacks; and mentorship and support to NCHRD-U

sector.narrative: Reporting on grant from the Dutch Ministry of Foreign Affairs
